name: Workshop Toolkit (v1.3)
description:
This toolkit includes exercise templates and instructions based on the Workshopper Playbook and our experience running workshops!


What's included:

  • [âœ¨ NEW] FigJenda session timers for each exercise
  • Intro to FigJam exercise
  • Personal workspaces
  • Sailboat Exercise
  • Dot Voting & HMWs
  • 10 for 10 exercise
  • Crazy 8s exercise
  • Brainwriting Exercise
  • Action board (Effort/Impact matrix)


We hope you enjoy, and we strongly encourage you to leave us feedback on this template so that we can continue to improve it!
